title: ECOMMERCE  WEBSITE
description: An e-commerce website for selling electronic gadgets, built using the MERN stack, featuring an admin panel, category-wise sections, login/signup functionality, and real-time communication with instant message delivery and live chat updates.

title: Chat Application
description: A MERN stack chat application utilizing Socket.IO for real-time communication, bcrypt for secure password hashing, and jsonwebtoken for authentication. Features include instant message delivery, live chat updates, and user authentication.

title: College Event Advertiser
description: A dynamic platform for promoting college events, offering a user-friendly interface to create, manage, and share event details. It features real-time updates, interactive event calendars, and seamless social media integration.
